title: Sonyâ€™s new Xperia 10 IV packs a massive 5000mAh battery and the Snapdragon 695 SoC
content:
Sony is in a world of its own when it comes to Android smartphones – and that isn’t meant as a compliment. For the past few years, its flagship devices have been eclipsed by the competition, consistently offering much of the same, but coming in at a drastically higher price. While its strategy might seem

The post Sony’s new Xperia 10 IV packs a massive 5000mAh battery and the Snapdragon 695 SoC appeared first on XDA.
description: Sony has announced its latest mid-range device, the Xperia 10 IV. The handset offers a sleek design, coupled with a large 5,000mAh battery.
